LABEL: 0x3D0
STRING: Hah. It's finally over.

LABEL: 0x413
STRING: The constant deception is wearing me down.

LABEL: 0x462
STRING: As the lies pile up, I have to be consistent with the lies I've used already.

LABEL: 0x4D1
STRING: I wove a tapestry of falsehoods and hid myself behind various masks.

LABEL: 0x530
STRING: I keep pretending to be something I'm not.

LABEL: 0x575
STRING: I can't wait to say goodbye to the days of living like that.

LABEL: 0x5CC
STRING: This isn't where I belong.

LABEL: 0x625
STRING: The only place in the world where I should be, where I want to be, is that flower garden.

LABEL: 0x692
STRING: The chime of the end of the day is the bringer of good news.

LABEL: 0x6F9
STRING: Just listening to it makes me feel light-hearted and I start to smile.

LABEL: 0x756
STRING: I quickly get ready to leave school, thinking about the time I'm going to spend with Psico later.

LABEL: 0x7C5
STRING: I'm glad I'm not on cleaning duty this week, only the ones who like it should be doing that stuff, leave the rest of us alone.

LABEL: 0x844
STRING: Now, I remember today's croissant needs to be the one with chocolate on it.

LABEL: 0x8AD
STRING: I can't wait to see how she reacts. She'll be happy for sure.

LABEL: 0x906
STRING: I don't want to think about the event that they're all sold out. I don't want to see Psico's sad face, and I don't want to be the cause of it.

LABEL: 0x98D
STRING: So, I'd better hurry──

LABEL: 0xA77
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xA85
STRING: "Metarou, Yukimaru〜. Won't you go to karaoke with me now?"

LABEL: 0xC31
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xC3F
STRING: "Sounds good, I haven't been there in a while. Of course you're coming too, right, Metarou?"

LABEL: 0xD3D
STRING: ─Hah?

LABEL: 0xD7A
STRING: Don't be ridiculous. No matter how long we've known each other since childhood, I won't allow you to take up my precious time with Psico.

LABEL: 0xDEB
STRING: Psico has no one but me. I have no one but Psico.

LABEL: 0xE4E
STRING: But you guys have a lot of other friends, so why don't you go with them?

LABEL: 0xEC7
STRING: I don't have time for that kind of farce.

LABEL: 0xF20
STRING: ─These things popped into my mind.

LABEL: 0xF69
STRING: But if I say such a thing, all the lies I've carefully piled up to this point will crumble down.

LABEL: 0xFDF
STRING: I want to avoid that.

LIST.STRING: Sorry, I've got a part-time job.

LABEL: 0x110A
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1118
STRING: "Eh, why don't you come once in a while? You never come..."

LABEL: 0x12A3
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x12B1
STRING: "There, there, Nana. Metarou, you said you were going to live on your own after graduation, you're saving up for that, right?"

LABEL: 0x13B5
STRING: That's rare.

LABEL: 0x13F6
STRING: I mix truth into lies in order to obscure the truth... It's something you hear often.

LABEL: 0x1469
STRING: In fact, this is an effective strategy.

LABEL: 0x14AE
STRING: I'm saving up money but I don't have a part-time job. If I had that kind of time, I'd spend it all with Psico.

LABEL: 0x15DD
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x15EB
STRING: "Hmph. Well, whatever. You better come next time. For sure, okay?"

LABEL: 0x16E5
STRING: Without saying yes or no, I just mumbled through it and left it at that.

STRING: Don't get in my way.

LABEL: 0x1791

LABEL: 0x191B
STRING: Nana

STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1A94
STRING: "Hmm, what's up, Nana?"

STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1C11
STRING: "...Is it just me, or is Metarou up to something recently?"

LABEL: 0x1DA4
STRING: Yukimaru

STRING: "Isn't it just his part-time job? He's been saying he wants to leave his house for a while now."

LABEL: 0x1F45
STRING: Nana

STRING: "...Something tells me there's more to it than that."

LABEL: 0x20DC
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x22A1
STRING: Nana

STRING: "I never thought of that. Now I'm curious, let's go after him!"

LABEL: 0x243C
STRING: Yukimaru

STRING: "Hey, hey. Don't do that. Think about the poor guy."

LABEL: 0x25CF
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2798
STRING: Nana

STRING: "I've been thinking about this for a while, but he doesn't really talk with us much anymore..."

LABEL: 0x293F
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2ACC
STRING: Nana

STRING: That place is a secret place for me and Psico alone.

LABEL: 0x2EEE
STRING: It's our sanctuary.

STRING: Psico is mine only.

STRING: Psico is the only one who understands me.

STRING: The only one who's there for me.

LABEL: 0x3183

LABEL: 0x325B
STRING: It's not that I don't like her or doubt her.

LABEL: 0x32BE
STRING: There are times when I simply wonder what is it about her that stirs me up.

LABEL: 0x331C
STRING: But this self-questioning lasts only a moment.

LABEL: 0x3355
STRING: It's no big deal.

LABEL: 0x338F
STRING: Even last night, I saw her in my dream.

LABEL: 0x33C0
STRING: Psico has been my support ever since I was a child.

LABEL: 0x3419
STRING: If I had remained alone, I don't even know if I would be alive right now.

LABEL: 0x3486

STRING: Psico can't leave that flower garden.

STRING: She spends every day in that place.

LABEL: 0x35DA

LABEL: 0x36B8

LABEL: 0x3707

LABEL: 0x3BA0

LABEL: 0x3C38

LABEL: 0x3C7D

LABEL: 0x43E2

LABEL: 0x44FD
STRING: Ah, gentle Metarou.

LABEL: 0x453E

LABEL: 0x45B3

LABEL: 0x4B04

LABEL: 0x5DF7

STRING: Even though we're chidhood friends, we're still boy and girl.

STRING: I guess it's just the natural flow of events.

STRING: Metarou, Yukimaru, and I.

STRING: The three of us used to hang out a lot.

LABEL: 0x8388
STRING: I wished it would stay that way forever.

STRING: ...But, little by little, Metarou changed.

STRING: He ran all over the place, getting injured a lot.

STRING: But, still he was grinning all over.

STRING: Yukimaru and I laughed along with him.

LABEL: 0x8554
STRING: But I don't know when, during elementary school,

LABEL: 0x8587
STRING: Metarou started to talk less and less.

LABEL: 0x85DC
STRING: From then on, we started to play together less and less.

LABEL: 0x863B
STRING: By the time we reached middle school, he was often on his lonesome.

LABEL: 0x869C
STRING: He seems totally normal when I talk to him.

STRING: %ZI was relieved, thinking:

LABEL: 0x873A
STRING: "Oh, it's the usual Metarou."

LABEL: 0x877F
STRING: Up until now, I thought it was all just a natural part of growing up, or a change in environment, or something like that.

LABEL: 0x8814
STRING: But─I'm worried because I've seen such a disturbing thing.

LABEL: 0x886F
STRING: I was afraid that... the Metarou I knew actually never existed.

LABEL: 0x8996
STRING: While I was thinking things over, I arrived at a place I remember well.

LABEL: 0x89F3
STRING: Metarou's house.

LABEL: 0x8A2E
STRING: Nervously, I pressed the doorbell.

LABEL: 0x8A81
STRING: After a while, a middle aged person appeared.

STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x8AF6
STRING: "Nana-chan...?"

LABEL: 0x8BDC
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x8BEA
STRING: "Hello, it's been a long time, Auntie."

LABEL: 0x8CD0
STRING: Metarou's mother. It's been a long time since we last met.

LABEL: 0x8D1C
STRING: She seems tired.

LABEL: 0x8D3F
STRING: She looks more downtrodden than when I last saw her.

LABEL: 0x8D6F
STRING: There's something gloomy about her.

LABEL: 0x8DA9
STRING: Raising a child as a single mother must be tough...

LABEL: 0x8DEC
STRING: She has to work too.

LABEL: 0x8E26
STRING: She seemed to recognize me.

LABEL: 0x8E5D
STRING: I've been here many times, so I guess it's natural.

LABEL: 0x8EA6
STRING: But I guess she was really surprised that I suddenly showed up at her door.

STRING: I would like to chat with you.

LABEL: 0x8F3F
STRING: I have so much I want to tell you and so much to ask you.

STRING: "Excuse me, Auntie... How is Metarou doing at home lately? Metarou's acting a little strange, so I'm a little worried..."

LABEL: 0x91E4

LABEL: 0x9291

LABEL: 0x9533
STRING: ─Night.

LABEL: 0x9568
STRING: As usual, I slipped out of the house and laid down in my secret place.

LABEL: 0x95D9
STRING: I can't fathom staying home anymore. I'd much rather be here than listen to my mother yell at me endlessly, or get beaten up even though I didn't do anything.

LABEL: 0x968E
STRING: This place, lit by moonlight, is more magical than any other place in the world... It's very, very beautiful.

LABEL: 0x9707
STRING: I was so excited and proud knowing that it was just Psico and I who had this wonderful place all to ourselves.

LABEL: 0x9796
STRING: My heart is fulfilled, my spirit is at ease, and I am happy.

LABEL: 0x97F7
STRING: So, I thought.

LABEL: 0x9836
STRING: As I relaxed, my eyelids became heavier and heavier.

LABEL: 0x9895
STRING: I slowly closed my eyelids, content and happy.

STRING: There was a cracking sound... I arose from my slumber.

LABEL: 0x996D
STRING: Panting heavily, I looked around me.

LABEL: 0x99B8
STRING: I can't let anyone find out about this sacred place.

LABEL: 0x9A21
STRING: I can't let any of them trespass onto this place. Not even one person.

LABEL: 0x9A84
STRING: Because this is a paradise just for Psico and I.

STRING: But... something seems off.

LABEL: 0x9D5D
STRING: I had a feeling it wasn't just water.

LABEL: 0x9D9D
STRING: Where have I smelled this before?

LABEL: 0x9DC6
STRING: It's─

LABEL: 0x9DFD
STRING: No, right now there was something I was more concerned about.

LABEL: 0x9E5B
STRING: Psico's expression.

LABEL: 0x9E7C
STRING: Her eyes were red as if she had been crying.

LABEL: 0x9EBA
STRING: She had a gloomy atmosphere that was not like the usual Psico at all.

LABEL: 0xA000
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA00E
STRING: "...Metarou."

LABEL: 0xA0D7
STRING: Psico's voice was very quiet. It was calm, even so far as to be refreshing.

LABEL: 0xA142
STRING: She smiled with such compassion and─

LABEL: 0xA261
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA26F
STRING: "─It's... already... Over..."

LABEL: 0xA35C
STRING: Lifting the bucket, Psico drenches her head with the liquid inside.

LABEL: 0xA459
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA467
STRING: "......Aha, that's not it."

LABEL: 0xA540
STRING: She was soaking wet and when she saw me staring at her, she broke into a little smile.

LABEL: 0xA5BB
STRING: Droplets of water spilled down her green hair.

LABEL: 0xA610
STRING: Right, I knew then that this smell was...

LABEL: 0xA703
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA711
STRING: "This is... Yes, it must be this way..."

LABEL: 0xA7E8
STRING: Psico took a lighter out of her pocket and lit it.

LABEL: 0xA8E3
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xA8F1
STRING: "Maybe, from the start."

LABEL: 0xA9C2
STRING: Psico was illuminated by the light of the small, flickering flame.

LABEL: 0xAAB1
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xAABF
STRING: "─Don't ever forget about me, okay? Ever."

LABEL: 0xAC48
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xAC56
STRING: "It's a『Promise.』"

LABEL: 0xADC9
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xADD7
STRING: "Forever... Look at me and me alone."

LABEL: 0xAEB6
STRING: As she said that, Psico dropped the lighter on the floor.

LABEL: 0xAF80
STRING: The lighter ignited the liquid on the floor and her small body was instantly engulfed in flames.

LABEL: 0xAFF9
STRING: I was so shocked that I fell on my bottom and could only watch as her body burned up.

LABEL: 0xB07C
STRING: A strange smell assaulted my nose. The smell of burning human beings.

LABEL: 0xB0D3
STRING: I didn't hear the screams that I would normally have heard. Psico was just there, like a mannequin.

LABEL: 0xB156
STRING: Even at this very moment, her white skin and silky hair are burning up.

LABEL: 0xB1CD
STRING: It burns and burns─Until, eventually, it turns to ashes.

LABEL: 0xB222
STRING: ...Suddenly, Psico extended her hands.

LABEL: 0xB271
STRING: It was as if she was trying to pat me on the head.

LABEL: 0xB2C6
STRING: It was as if she was trying to envelop my entire body.

LABEL: 0xB32F
STRING: Psico

LABEL: 0xB33D
STRING: 『 I  Love  You,  Metarou 』

LABEL: 0xB38D
STRING: I thought I heard Psico's voice one last time, even though it might be a hallucination.

LABEL: 0xB3D6
STRING: It was stuck in my ears and wouldn't fade.
